channel.title: How Do You Make A Player Start Of With An Item, Then Make It Unwieldable
channel.description:
[b]Hello I'm Wondering If Someone Can Help Me. I'm In Need To Find Out How You Make A Player Start Of With A Custon Item ? I Also Need To Find Out How You Make That Custon Item, Unwieldable.
If You've Played Dodian Before You Should Know.
Thankyou If You Help
~[u]JoJ[/u][/b]

item.title: How Do You Make A Player Start Of With An Item, Then Make It Unwieldable
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

So basicly you want the new player to wield an item that wont be wieldable in the future?

Read full topic
item.source: How Do You Make A Player Start Of With An Item, Then Make It Unwieldable
